properties are used, and will be loaded in the AbstractMetadataReport constructor. see loadProperties method please.

Please take a look at the getExportedURLs method, it's just that no data is read from the cache file now, it should be implemented in the future.

Dubbo group 啊，group 就是专门你这个场景的

Service:
```xml
<dubbo:service group="feedback" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
<dubbo:service group="member" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
```

Reference:
```xml
<dubbo:reference id="feedbackIndexService" group="feedback" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
<dubbo:reference id="memberIndexService" group="member" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
```

https://dubbo.apache.org/zh/docs/v2.7/user/examples/service-group/

> 杜博集团，团体古人
> 
> 服务：
> 
> ```

> <dubbo:service group="member" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
> ```

> ```
> <dubbo:reference id="feedbackIndexService" group="feedback" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
> <dubbo:reference id="memberIndexService" group="member" interface="com.xxx.IndexService" />
> ```
> 
> https://dubbo.apache.org/zh/docs/v2.7/user/examples/service-group/
